titleInfo.title: Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia: Supplementary Material

mods.abstract: This supplement contains study materials and their English translations related to the paper Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia by Laura Saldarriaga, Antonio Olivera-La Rosa, and Gerd Bohner

bibliographicCitation.harvard1: Saldarriaga, L.P., Olivera-La Rosa, A., & Bohner, G., 2019. Moral Foundations and Perceptions of Rape in Colombia: Supplementary Material, Bielefeld University.
